0d6b3f2c-4111-4d1e-a0d0-17d50970fd39.description: The Oracle Primavera training course, delivered by Oracle Partner - TMR Project Consulting , will combine presentations with interactive practical exercises, using the Oracle Primavera P6 tool, workshop and case studies. The participant will be encouraged to use and execute all the guidelines elaborated by using the tool provided.
0d6b3f2c-4111-4d1e-a0d0-17d50970fd39.name: Primavera P6 Scheduler Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Oracle Primavera P6 training session (online or face to face) where you will learn how to : Manage a project through its entire life cycle, be able to plan and execute using Primavera P6 Professional application ,learn to add activities, assign resources, and create a baseline. Gain a thorough background in the concepts of planning and scheduling

1f3bf58d-3398-4493-9c87-a62b996c90ae.description: The interior design training course provided by our expert Ms Mouna Ben Romdhan , will combine presentations and practical activities in 7 scheduled workshops. The participant will be encouraged to understand, analyze and design solutions that respect trends and space limitations.
1f3bf58d-3398-4493-9c87-a62b996c90ae.name: Interior Designer Professional

badge_template_activities.title: In this training, the participant will design solutions that meet trends and space requirements. This training will provide you with all the technical and theoretical skills essential to the field. You will also learn to Draw sketches and plans of a designed interior space using manual solutions and softwares. Manage the different options and combinations of colors, materials, furniture and atmospheres.

eb62f914-5931-4660-820a-95cea3e03620.description: Looking for new ways to create powerful visualizations, Microsoft Power BI is the solution. You can turn your company's data into brilliant, fancy visualizations that you can use to collect and organize data to spot trends, collaborate in new ways, and make sense of your data.In this training, you will learn about data analysis expressions (DAX) and data visualization with Power BI Desktop.
eb62f914-5931-4660-820a-95cea3e03620.name: Microsoft Power BI Analyst Professional

badge_template_activities.title: At the end of this training, you will master several concepts such as :Power BI Desktop,Power BI DAX;Power BI Q&A;Power BI Content packs,Power BI Custom Visuals,Power BI Integrations with Azure Machine Learning. Training objectives: Query and combine heterogeneous data sources.Prepare and transform data with Power Query and the M language.Design sophisticated metrics with the DAX language.Create complex reports with Power BI Desktop.Publish reports to the Power BI service and build dashboards.
